price: 75. No se les mitigará el castigo (ni por un momento) y desesperarán (de recibir la misericordia de Al-lah).
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
